mapper.select: SELECT ddpa.id AS attr_id, ddpa.attr AS attr_name, GROUP_CONCAT(ddpav.id) AS attr_value_ids, GROUP_CONCAT(ddpav.`name`) AS attr_values FROM djmall_dict_product_sku_gm ddpsg LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_attr ddpa ON ddpsg.attr_id = ddpa.id LEFT JOIN djmall_dict_product_attr_value ddpav ON ddpav.attr_id = ddpa.id WHERE ddpsg.product_type = #{productType} GROUP BY ddpa.id

SELECT dps.id as product_id, dps.product_name, dps.freight_id, dps.product_describe, dps.img, dabd.`name` FROM djmall_product_spu dps LEFT JOIN djmall_auth_base_data dabd ON dps.type = dabd.`code` WHERE dps.id = #{id}
